column1: # "farlands" remix - contains many (but not all) items from the farlands game, concentrating on the
#       farlands/decoblocks and farlands/mapgen mods. Includes all biomes, decorations and ores
# Because many farlands mods share a name with minetest_game mods, everything has been grouped into
#       a hypothetical "farlands" mod. Original names for items are only specified in code when
#       their mods don't appear in minetest_game (e.g. decoblocks, mapgen, etc)
# (Commented out because the nodes are not placed in the world)
#   use the following ore packages to produce leaves-with-fruit nodes...
# ...that does not work very well on modern Minetest, so it's recommended that you COMMENT OUT the
#   ore packages above, and instead load this shared package, which uses an ABM
# The following package provides fruit-as-node variants. You should add it to your remixes (or
#   uncomment the line below) if you use schematics that need the fruit-as-node variants, such as
